title: Ranked queue remains off to finish 2015 season deploy
body:
Hello Summoners,

The ranked season work is running a little longer than we anticipated. We are keeping ranked down until it's completed. I will update this thread with more info soon.

Thanks for your patience.
_____________________________________

Update, 8:48am AEDT - we ran into an issue but have resolved it and moving forward. If all goes well, ranked should be up around 9:30am AEDT. (hopefully sooner)

Update, 9:00am AEDT - Ranked is back on, enjoy the 2015 Ranked Season! Thanks again for your patience.

replies.body: I dont think playing league at 8Am was a smart decision anyway :P
I lost my first game gg top mid lose report 9x afk
But Chuchuz you have to be first to challenger
You'd have to ask Ottoke how smart it is :P
Ranked is back on everyone, thanks for your patience and let's have a great 2015 season!
Can you put an estimated time up, I have been waiting since this day for months now :)
I hear you SyntaxER, I am working with the team now and will provide an eta for you soon. As of now, we do think it will finish up soon.
HOW SOON BB? I WANNA CRUSH SOME SCRUBS

I just posted an update on the original post, but we basically hit a snag on the rollout and have since identified the issue. We are now moving forward again and plan to be wrapped up in the next 30mins or so. I will update again if that changes.
Thank you Cochese means a lot :)
When can we start to rank exactly? Today or another day?
Will be today Mid Daddy, and hopefully very soon. When you see the ranked queues back on, that is the official start for Oceania!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=xXcBRWBv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-20T21:08:24.470+0000)
> Update, 9:00am AEDT - Ranked is back on, enjoy the 2015 Ranked Season! Thanks again for your patience.

so thats what caused me to DC mid game and the whole game to have lag.

EDIT: actually i had my lag roughly ~ 8:20am. It was a Game wide dc too and you can tell it wasnt my connection cause my ping is sitting around 30. which has gone up from 25 since this patch.
